CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(Status__c), "Assigned", "A new technology project has been assigned to you." & BR() & "Please begin work on this project and document project status changes in Salesforce.", "Completed", "A technology project has been completed." & BR() & "The associated case #" & Technology_Case__r.Name & " has been closed.", "")
CustomField.label: Email Alert Header Text
